General.Name: iRay Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: iRay Technology Company Limited develops, manufactures, and sells flat panel X-ray detectors for use in medical, dental, oncology, veterinary, security, and industrial imaging applications in China and internationally. It offers wireless radiography, tethered radiography, mammography, dynamic/real-time, linear detector array products, x-ray sources, high voltage generators, and radiation detecting materials, as well as related software. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Chengbin  Qiu
2.Title: CTO, Deputy GM, Core Technician & Director
